Goodyear.La Joya Community High School:
La Joya Community High School (LJ, LJCHS, or LHS) is a community high school located in Avondale, Arizona, USA. It serves grades 9 through 12 and is part of the Tolleson Union High School District. Currently 2200 students are enrolled.
